attributes.action: Invest in a new form of public transport called personal rapid transit
attributes.additional_details:
The social and environmental benefits of public transport are already there. But advancing technology has come to the point where there is a new cheaper, safer, greener, more accessible form of public transport that has revolutionized travel around Heathrow Airport terminal 5, similar to a taxi. This is easier than what google is trying to do, make self-driving cars running on public roads.
Please sign to show your support for it being part of town planning across the UK.

rejection.details: The petition calls for investment in such technology, but it does not state what part central Government is expected to play in this.
